interpretation:
The Cross Mark card represents the end of a cycle or a negative outcome. It indicates that something has come to an end or is not working out as expected. This card could signify rejection, failure, or disappointment. It is a clear indication that things are not going according to plan, and it's time to reevaluate the situation.

When this card appears, it's important to take a step back and assess the situation. It may be time to let go of certain expectations or to move on from something that is no longer serving you. It could also indicate the need for a change in direction.

The Cross Mark card reminds us that failure is not the end of the road. It's an opportunity to learn and grow. It's essential to keep a positive attitude and remember that every setback is a chance to learn and improve.

Overall, the Cross Mark card advises us to let go of what isn't working and move forward with a new perspective. It's time to embrace change and trust that everything will work out in the end.
